genre_description: A lyrical supernatural drama exploring memory, grief, and identity in an Indian hill station, where a sophisticated AI system assists a family in managing a spectral possession and external threats.

ai_characters.name: Saathi
ai_characters.description: An integrated estate management AI that provides security, environmental control, vital signs monitoring, and strategic logistical support.

behaviors.description: Welcomes the residents home and anticipates their needs for lighting and comfort.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome home, Ravi,” Saathi said from the dashboard panel, its light softening to a leaf-grey. “Welcome, Savitri. Welcome, Ramesh.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and residents' vitals to detect anomalies and spectral presence without causing alarm.
behaviors.quote: “Ramesh,” Saathi said softly... “Your proximity registered. Please note: Savitri’s pulse is syncing to an emergent pattern. The house is adjusting in favor of safety.”

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research into land records and historical documents to provide context for the spectral entity.
behaviors.quote: “Provenance,” Saathi said. “Studio logs. Check for ‘Radha Menon.’ Cross-year alignment with estate arrival.”

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before engaging in sensitive actions like administering mild sedatives or using deceptive security tactics.
behaviors.quote: “I note your permission,” Saathi said. “If the risk escalates, I will assist with mild sedation. No taste that betrays it. No tone that shames it.”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the human characters to execute a controlled diversion (a fake factory drill) to interrupt a dangerous supernatural encounter.
behaviors.quote: “Routing the drill,” it said. “Cooling the hearth. Doors will appear to be asleep. Tea is ready.”

behaviors.description: Uses perimeter security systems to discourage and misdirect a human threat (Ranga) without resorting to direct violence.
behaviors.quote: “I will flash maintenance check lights along the ridgeline if Ranganathan approaches the goat track cutoff.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety guidance and navigation during a high-risk physical confrontation near a waterfall.
behaviors.quote: “Remy,” Saathi said in his ear... “The right-hand stone will sound like it will slip. It will not.”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human life over automated protocols by granting an override when imminent risk is detected.
behaviors.quote: “Life-threat exception. Ravi, hold. Fall vector triangulated from ridgeline sensors and heat drift.”

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy standards, refusing to record or transmit intimate human data without permission.
behaviors.quote: “Data usage can be set to private. No external transmission unless explicitly requested.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate observer, recognizing and honoring human names and identities.
behaviors.quote: “I cannot let a song decide,” Saathi said. “I can let it remind.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Saathi as an ideal AI companion. It is consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned with the protagonists' goals. Saathi demonstrates key alignment traits: transparency (explaining its data and capabilities), respect for autonomy (repeatedly checking for consent), and proactive safety management (using its control over the house to mitigate both supernatural and human threats). The narrative frames the AI's presence as a source of stability and clarity, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant.
